original_text: Then I would chase after the lion or the bear. I would knock it down and I would save the lamb from its mouth. If the wild animal turned to attack me, I would take hold of its neck. Then I would hit it and kill it.
korean_text: 내가 따라가서 그것을 치고 그 입에서 새끼를 건져내었고 그것이 일어나 나를 해하고자 하면 내가 그 수염을 잡고 그것을 쳐죽였나이다

sentences.original_text: Then I would chase after the lion
and I would save the lamb
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 어린 양을 구했을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: If the wild animal turned to attack me
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 그 야생 동물이 나를 공격하기로 돌아서면

sentences.original_text: I would take hold of its neck
